title: Contemporary Canberra Studio & Apartment Stay near Lake Burley Griffin
description:
Experience a blend of urban serenity and modern comfort at this retreat, nestled amid the greenery of Canberraâ€™s sought-after Campbell district. Ideally located in the heart of the Australian capital, the property features self-contained studios and apartments designed to offer a welcoming home-away-from-home atmosphere.

Explore Canberra's vibrant culinary scene, celebrated for its farm-to-table dining and cool-climate wines, or unwind in charming cafes. For outdoor enthusiasts, enjoy cycling the scenic Lake Burley Griffin loop while taking in breathtaking city views - upgrade to a pet-friendly package to bring along your furry companions for an unforgettable Canberra getaway.
offer_address: 16 Provan Street, Campbell, Australian Capital Territory 2612, Australia
